channel.title: Ml on Thomas Coopman - Infinite Tree

item.title: Why I choose Bucklescript
item.description: On the meetups I attend, some people know me as the Elm guy. Yet, when reading the title of this post, you can see that I’m going for Bucklescript lately. In this post I’m going to try to explain my choice for Bucklescript. If you are in doubt, maybe some points in this post can help, but my advice would be to just try and research both languages and see for yourself.
